title: User finds Windows 1.0 Easter egg featuring Valveâ€™s Gabe Newell
content:
Finding secrets in software is always fun, and something some users try to do as soon as a new piece of software is released. But recently, a Twitter user named Lucas Brooks discovered an easter egg in a very old version of Windows – the very first version, in fact. Over 35 years later, it

The post User finds Windows 1.0 Easter egg featuring Valve’s Gabe Newell appeared first on xda-developers.
description: An Easter egg in Windows 1.0 featuring Gabe Newell went undiscovered for decades, but one Twitter user recently managed to uncover it.
